title: Coach
description: The variety progrum welcomes Coach Tommy Tuberville, US Senator from Alabama, for a conversation about changes to college athletics and other topics before the Senate. Meanwhile Smug, Duncan & Holmes discuss animal instinct, Facebook drama and the coming GOP wave.
author: hello@ruthlesspodcast.com (Ruthless Podcast)
